pkgmetadata.longdescription: Invariant Causal Prediction for Nonlinear Models // Performs 'nonlinear Invariant Causal Prediction' to estimate the causal parents of a given target variable from data collected in different experimental or environmental conditions, extending 'Invariant Causal Prediction' from Peters, Buehlmann and Meinshausen (2016), arXiv:1501.01332, to nonlinear settings. For more details, see C. Heinze-Deml, J. Peters and N. Meinshausen: 'Invariant Causal Prediction for Nonlinear Models', arXiv:1706.08576.
